title: Visualizing Mathematical Concepts Through Game-Based 3D Animation Production Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Training Current Elementary Teachers to Implement Mathematical Concepts via 3D Animation, Conducting Practice-Centered Education with Gamification Elements in a Digital Device-Provided Environment

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent at least four basic math concepts (geometry, fractions, measurement, patterns) using 3D animation tools
Learners can achieve over 80% project completion rates by applying self-regulated learning strategies during game-based tasks
Learners can revise and improve animation projects based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
